message: "Helen Van Dam works with Truckers Against Trafficking, and says the number one tip is keeping your eyes open, and talking to your family and friends about how serious sex trafficking is"

data.description: A group called Truckers Against Trafficking made a stop in Springfield Monday with tips on what you can do to help stop these crimes, where young girls are forced into sexual slavery.
data.title: Truckers get an education in sex trafficking signs
